ing: 2 large English (hothouse style) cucumbers, finely diced
des: "Light, fresh and delightful. This side salad is wonderful over fresh fish or grilled chicken."
ins: In a large serving bowl, lightly mix together the cucumbers, cantaloupe, olive oil, jalapeno pepper, lime juice, lime zest, red onion, tomato, cilantro, salt, and pepper. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours to let the flavors blend.
